price: Nokorε sε efri Solomon hͻ, na nokorε sε (mehyɛ ase wɔ) Nyankopͻn din mu, Ahummͻborͻ Hene, Ɔdεεfoͻ Hene. (Bismi Laahir-Rah’maanir-Rahiim):
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
